recipes.name: Maarten's Toetje
ingredients: 1 pint Ben & Jerry's Chocolate Ice Cream
1 pint Ben & Jerry's Vanilla Ice Cream
1 pint Ben & Jerry's Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Ice Cream
1 pint Ben & Jerry's Chocolate Fudge Brownie Ice Cream
1 pint Ben & Jerry's Chocolate Peanut Butter Cup Ice Cream
1 pint Ben & Jerry's Chocolate Chunk Cookie Dough Ice Cream
recipes.instructions: Mix all ice creams together and serve.
